S

sendOutputMessageMap() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.connections.Connection
Converts this objects Connection.outputStream to a JSON-String and writes that String to the Sockets Connection.outputStream for the connected device to receive it.
Server - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server
The main class of this Server.
It implements the IConnectionControl interface, which means control of connections is maintained by another component, making this part of the server a trusted environment with the other component deciding which devices to allow connection.
Server() - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.Server
 
setCamera(boolean) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.helper.CarInformation

setIp(String) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.helper.CarInformation
 
setLeftDistanceSensor(boolean) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.helper.CarInformation
 
setLights(boolean) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.helper.CarInformation
 
setLinkedCar(CarConnection) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.connections.PhoneConnection
Sets the CarConnection, to link this device to the given car.
setLinkedPhone(PhoneConnection) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.connections.CarConnection
Sets the linked Phone to the given parameter, therefore terminating any link that might already be established.
If the CarConnection.linkedPhones state is currently not null, it is informed about the termination of the link.
setRightDistanceSensor(boolean) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.helper.CarInformation
 
setupAcceptor() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.ConnectionAcceptor
Tries to bind the acceptor on a port.
setupSocket() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.ConnectionAcceptor
Blocks until the acceptor accepts a new Socket, sets up the Socket and return it.
After being accepted, the Sockets so_timeout is set to 1 ms, nagles algorithm is deactivated (prevent data-collection), maximum allowed shutdown time is set to 1 second and the DSCP-byte is set to prioritize the Sockets data-packets over others.
setVelocitySensor(boolean) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.helper.CarInformation
 
setWinkers(boolean) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.helper.CarInformation
 
state - Static variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.helper.Keywords
 
steering - Static variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.helper.Keywords
 
stop - Static variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.helper.Keywords
